response.original_title: NordicVision Ski Machine: St. Moritz, Switzerland
response.overview: Energize your workouts! Watch while you ski! Your workout time will go faster and be more enjoyable with NordicVision. Special “point of view” photography puts you right on the trail - gliding over snow with the real motion of cross-country skiing. This program contains three separate workouts from picturesque St. Moritz, Switzerland, the most famous resort in the world.
response.tagline: Scenic video workouts for cross-country ski machines.
response.title: NordicVision Ski Machine: St. Moritz, Switzerland
